verbs.description: [ARG0: U.S. President Donald Trump] , [ARGM-TMP: after his historic summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] , [V: said] [ARG1: Pyongyang no longer posed a nuclear threat] .
U.S. President Donald Trump , after his historic summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un , said [ARG0: Pyongyang] [ARGM-TMP: no longer] [V: posed] [ARG1: a nuclear threat] .
